fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are roleblocked, you will attack the role blocker in addition to your target.
- When you automatically kill a roleblocker, the roleblock attempt will fail.
- Roleblockers that target you will have their wills covered in blood, making it unreadable.
- At night, you may choose to spare roleblockers instead.

- If you roll this, you may choose to reroll this into another random "Serial Killer/SK" role for free. You're welcome.
- You also can choose to keep this role, if you actually want it for whatever reason.
- You kill anyone with a defense below None. So anything like Vulnerable or **anything** weaker than None defense will die to your attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
